A complete contact system, supporting the most popular standards and
services.  To add to your Plone instance, add the following to the
buildout configuration:

zcml =
    GrailTact.GrailTact

eggs =
    Plone
    GrailTact

And install GrailTact, MegamanicEdit and VariousDisplayWidgets through
the Plone control panel.
